mapper.insert: insert into `look` (orderNumber, shopNumber, shopName, shopDoller, shopInformation, discountDoller, discount, buyNumber, shopNote, userid,shopid redundant, redundant1) values (#{ordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopdoller,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shopinformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountdoller,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{discount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buynumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redundant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redundant1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{shopid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select * from `look` where userid=#{userid} and orderstate=#{state}
